headline: Mehdi Hasan Slams Taylor Greene AFPAC Excuse: ‘We Know She’s Dumb, But She’s Not that Dumb’
sentences:
‘Greene, the firebrand from Georgia, is now claiming she didn’t know the conference was organized by a white nationalist, which is nonsense’
EXCERPT:
HASAN: "As you can tell by the American-accented English, that didn’t take place in St. Petersburg, Russia.
Well, the problem is, as you can see there, members of the House of Representatives, two sitting members of the GOP caucus, in fact, Paul Gosar and Marjorie Taylor Greene, spoke at that conference.
Greene, the firebrand from Georgia, is now claiming that she didn’t know the conference was organized by a white nationalist, which is nonsense.
And yes, any time nutty fringe white nationalists are involved, you may wonder, 'Mehdi, why are you amplifying them at the top of the show?'
It took place about two hours down the street from St. Petersburg, Florida, at a far right white nationalist conference.
We know the gazpacho gestapo lady is dumb, but she’s not that dumb.
It also doesn’t help Greene’s case that the Idaho Lt. Gov.
Doesn’t help the Republican Party, to be honest.”
Janice McGeachin also spoke at the conference.
